Topic.Title: Preventing the page automatically scrolling to the options.

Posts.EditableText: In my Gamebook, each page has two options that a player can make. However, it will automatically scroll to the options preventing the player from reading the text beforehand. This is more of a quality of life issue than anything. But is there a way for me to prevent this?
Posts.HTML: In my Gamebook, each page has two options that a player can make. However, it will automatically scroll to the options preventing the player from reading the text beforehand. This is more of a quality of life issue than anything. But is there a way for me to prevent this?

Posts.EditableText:
In script view:
`JS.eval("scrollToEnd = function() {};")`

I think that should work in gamebook as well as text adventure mode.
